description: React component for displaying a progress overview dashboard with various metrics, icons, and visual progress indicators.

classes.name: CircularProgress
classes.description: A React component rendering a circular progress indicator with customizable size, stroke width, and color.

methods.name: getStatusColor
methods.description: Returns a color class string based on the status string.

methods.name: getStatusIcon
methods.description: Returns an icon component based on the status string.
